24#include <sys/cdefs.h>
25__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_core_ramht.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:30 riastradh Exp $");
26
27#include <core/ramht.h>
28#include <core/engine.h>
29
30static u32
31nvkm_ramht_hash(struct nvkm_ramht *ramht, int chid, u32 handle)
32{
33 u32 hash = 0;
34
35 while (handle) {
36 hash ^= (handle & ((1 << ramht->bits) - 1));
37 handle >>= ramht->bits;
38 }
39
40 hash ^= chid << (ramht->bits - 4);
41 return hash;
42}
43
44struct nvkm_gpuobj *
45nvkm_ramht_search(struct nvkm_ramht *ramht, int chid, u32 handle)
46{
47 u32 co, ho;
48
49 co = ho = nvkm_ramht_hash(ramht, chid, handle);
50 do {
51 if (ramht->data[co].chid == chid) {
52 if (ramht->data[co].handle == handle)
53 return ramht->data[co].inst;
54 }
55
56 if (++co >= ramht->size)
57 co = 0;
58 } while (co != ho);
59
60 return NULL;
61}
62
63static int
64nvkm_ramht_update(struct nvkm_ramht *ramht, int co, struct nvkm_object *object,
65 int chid, int addr, u32 handle, u32 context)
66{
67 struct nvkm_ramht_data *data = &ramht->data[co];
68 u64 inst = 0x00000040; /* just non-zero for <=g8x fifo ramht */
69 int ret;
70
71 nvkm_gpuobj_del(&data->inst);
72 data->chid = chid;
73 data->handle = handle;
74
75 if (object) {
76 ret = nvkm_object_bind(object, ramht->parent, 16, &data->inst);
77 if (ret) {
78 if (ret != -ENODEV) {
79 data->chid = -1;
80 return ret;
81 }
82 data->inst = NULL;
83 }
84
85 if (data->inst) {
86 if (ramht->device->card_type >= NV_50)
87 inst = data->inst->node->offset;
88 else
89 inst = data->inst->addr;
90 }
91
92 if (addr < 0) context |= inst << -addr;
93 else context |= inst >> addr;
94 }
95
96 nvkm_kmap(ramht->gpuobj);
97 nvkm_wo32(ramht->gpuobj, (co << 3) + 0, handle);
98 nvkm_wo32(ramht->gpuobj, (co << 3) + 4, context);
99 nvkm_done(ramht->gpuobj);
100 return co + 1;
101}
102
103void
104nvkm_ramht_remove(struct nvkm_ramht *ramht, int cookie)
105{
106 if (--cookie >= 0)
107 nvkm_ramht_update(ramht, cookie, NULL, -1, 0, 0, 0);
108}
109
110int
111nvkm_ramht_insert(struct nvkm_ramht *ramht, struct nvkm_object *object,
112 int chid, int addr, u32 handle, u32 context)
113{
114 u32 co, ho;
115
116 if (nvkm_ramht_search(ramht, chid, handle))
117 return -EEXIST;
118
119 co = ho = nvkm_ramht_hash(ramht, chid, handle);
120 do {
121 if (ramht->data[co].chid < 0) {
122 return nvkm_ramht_update(ramht, co, object, chid,
123 addr, handle, context);
124 }
125
126 if (++co >= ramht->size)
127 co = 0;
128 } while (co != ho);
129
130 return -ENOSPC;
131}
132
133void
134nvkm_ramht_del(struct nvkm_ramht **pramht)
135{
136 struct nvkm_ramht *ramht = *pramht;
137 if (ramht) {
138 nvkm_gpuobj_del(&ramht->gpuobj);
139 vfree(*pramht);
140 *pramht = NULL;
141 }
142}
143
144int
145nvkm_ramht_new(struct nvkm_device *device, u32 size, u32 align,
146 struct nvkm_gpuobj *parent, struct nvkm_ramht **pramht)
147{
148 struct nvkm_ramht *ramht;
149 int ret, i;
150
151 if (!(ramht = *pramht = vzalloc(sizeof(*ramht) +
152 (size >> 3) * sizeof(*ramht->data))))
153 return -ENOMEM;
154
155 ramht->device = device;
156 ramht->parent = parent;
157 ramht->size = size >> 3;
158 ramht->bits = order_base_2(ramht->size);
159 for (i = 0; i < ramht->size; i++)
160 ramht->data[i].chid = -1;
161
162 ret = nvkm_gpuobj_new(ramht->device, size, align, true,
163 ramht->parent, &ramht->gpuobj);
164 if (ret)
165 nvkm_ramht_del(pramht);
166 return ret;
167}
